page.title: 07A SCHOOL IN THE PEWSEY VALE
page.content: Oare School is a small school. It has three classrooms, a library, a music room and a computer area. At the start of each day there is an assembly. The local vicar takes this service once a week. Each day we have a mathematics lesson and an English one. Other things we study are Topic work, which includes Geography, History and Science; Art, Music, R.E. and Games. During lunch-times we can learn to play recorders, guitars and hand-bells. We play many different types of games and take part in local football and netball tournaments. At Christmas we have a Carol Service which includes poetry and a short play. In the summer term we have a Concert consisting of a play and many musical items.
